stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 1 core damage unless the Runner trashes 1 installed resource. Subroutine Do 1 core damage unless the Runner trashes 1 installed piece of hardware. Subroutine Do 1 core damage unless the Runner trashes 1 installed program.
text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage unless the Runner trashes 1 installed resource. title: Kamali 1.0
